name: Overseer  - MySQL Administration Tool
short_description: Overseer is a MySQL administration tool (front-end). It offers the same features as the popular phpMyAdmin application. It works on Windows and Linux, and it can easily be adapted to other SQL servers (such as Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle, etc)
